column1: The 2nd Accused Appellant along with the now deceased 1st accused M.K. Pradeep Nishantha
was indicted before the High Court of Matara for committing the murder of Thalpavila Vidana
Kankanamge Sujith, an offence punishable under Section 296 of the Penal Code read along
with  Section  32.  The  1st  Accused  was  reported  dead  before  the  trial  commenced.  The
judgment in this matter was delivered on 31. 05. 2017, convicting the 2nd accused appellant
(herein after referred as the appellant). Accordingly, the death sentence was imposed.
